meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well. As luck would have it, this word actually covers most of the meanings of the English word <vocabulary>point</vocabulary>, too! So it can mean things like <vocabulary>score</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>viewpoint</vocabulary>, and <vocabulary>decimal point</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this word is the same as the reading for the kanji that makes it.
